9: The research shows that spending time in nature can significantly reduce stress levels.
(1) Nature has no effect on stress.
(2) Spending time outdoors can help lower stress levels, according to research.
(3) Stress is only caused by indoor activities.
(4) The research indicates that stress cannot be managed by spending time in nature.
10: The new policy aims to enhance employee productivity by offering flexible work hours.
(1) The new policy is focused on increasing employee productivity through rigid work schedules.
(2) Flexible work hours are designed to improve productivity among employees under the new policy.
(3) Employee productivity is not considered in the new policy.
(4) The new policy will have no effect on employee productivity.
11: Climate change is causing extreme weather patterns, leading to more frequent natural disasters.
(1) Climate change has no impact on natural disasters.
(2) Extreme weather patterns, resulting from climate change, are increasing the occurrence of natural disasters.
(3) Natural disasters are a result of human activities only.
(4) Weather patterns are becoming less extreme due to climate change.
12: The documentary reveals the struggles faced by wildlife due to habitat loss.
(1) The documentary highlights the benefits of habitat loss for wildlife.
(2) Habitat loss has no effect on wildlife, according to the documentary.
(3) The struggles of wildlife resulting from habitat loss are depicted in the documentary.
(4) The documentary does not address issues related to wildlife.
